attributes.action: understand that the Russell Brand show with Johnathan Ross was a comedy programme and it was funny.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The offending show, broadcast on 18/10/2008 was a comedy show. Offence may have accidentally have been caused but hey, you cannot please everyone. Andrew Sachs has had an apology so let's get on with the show and continue the brilliance which is The Russell Brand show. Learn from the mistakes, not try and cover up the credit crunch with them!

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
